name: The Last Snowfall
description:
These are they which came out of great tribulation, and have washed their robes, and made them white in the blood of the Lamb.

Revelation 7:14

The Last Snowfall is about a world stuck in an endless winter, and a man trapped within the horrors of his mind. This is my first 'serious' game and so be prepared accordingly. 

A twine game, you click links to make choices. About 30 min to an hour. Leave a rating, comment, or follow me on twitter or itch.io if you want more. (Who knows if I'll make any more?)

(if there are issues with images and audio, let me know. However, I won't be able to fix them because I am dumb. It isn't crucial to the experience thankfully.)
